snippet: President Obama’s speech from the Bagram Air Base near Kabul was frustratingly weak on details of his exit strategy from a war that Americans are desperate to see end.
abstract: Editorial asserts Pres Obama’s speech at the Bagram Air Base in Afghanistan was frustratingly weak on details of his exit strategy from a war that Americans are desperate to see end.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s speech from the Bagram Air Base near Kabul was frustratingly weak on details of his exit strategy from a war that Americans are desperate to see end.
